settings_schema.header: To set up the GitHub plugin, you need to register a GitHub OAuth app here https://github.com/settings/applications/new.

settings.help_text: The client ID for the OAuth app registered with GitHub.
The client secret for the OAuth app registered with GitHub.
The webhook secret set in GitHub.
Select the username of the user that the plugin will post with. This can be any user, the name and icon will be overridden when posting.
The AES encryption key used to encrypt stored access tokens.
(Optional) Set to lock the plugin to a single GitHub organization.
(Optional) The base URL for using the plugin with a GitHub Enterprise installation. Example: https://github.example.com
(Optional) The upload URL for using the plugin with a GitHub Enterprise installation. This is often the same as your Base URL.
(Optional) make it possible to enable private repositories as well. Existing users should re-grant their access to plugin.

settings_schema.footer: * To report an issue, make a suggestion or a contribution, [check the repository](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-plugin-github).
